popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on melee attacks and protective effects
A mastery path focused on melee attacks and weakening effects

data.name: Absence of Faith
data.description: You deal 127 damage to your enemy and call upon Sigmar to Curse them for 10 seconds, causing all healing effects used on them to become 50% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy and call upon Sigmar to Curse them for {ABIL_8270_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, causing all healing effects used on them to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 1464 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for {ABIL_3884_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3884_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and they will deal {ABIL_3876_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {ABIL_3876_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Avatar of Sigmar
data.description: Increases the Strength, Willpower, Toughness, Initiative, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence of all group mates withing 100 feet by 50 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases the Strength, Willpower, Toughness, Initiative, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence of all group mates withing 100 feet by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.description: A powerful attack which deals 152 damage to your enemy.
data.rawDescription: A powerful attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy.

data.name: Breath of Sigmar
data.description: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health.

data.name: Charged Fury
data.description: Attacks which generate Righteous Fury will now generate 10 additional points.
data.rawDescription: Attacks which generate Righteous Fury will now generate 10 additional points.

data.name: Cleansing Power
data.description: Purify will also cleanse your entire group. It will not cleanse more than 1 effect per target.
data.rawDescription: Purify will also cleanse your entire group. It will not cleanse more than 1 effect per target.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Divine Aegis
data.description: Restores 240 health over 7 seconds, and increases your armor by 1320.

data.rawDescription: Heals an ally for {COM_0_VAL0} points, and an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Divine Amazement
data.description: You call upon the power of Sigmar, dealing 200 damage every second to all enemies in a 10 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Sigmar returns all the damage done to your enemies to you as health.
data.rawDescription: You call upon the power of Sigmar, dealing {ABIL_3049_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second to all enemies in a {ABIL_3049_COM_0_RADI_FEET} area around you for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Sigmar returns all the damage done to your enemies to you as health.

data.name: Divine Assault
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 84 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.
data.rawDescription:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.
data.rawDescription: A strong heal that will restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage, but all of your casted heals become {COM_1_VAL1}% less effective.

data.name: Divine Justice
data.description: Prayer of Righteousness will now deal 250 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: Prayer of Righteousness will now deal {ABIL_8243_COM_4_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Divine Light
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 775 damage for each person.
data.rawDescription: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, which will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} for each person.

data.name: Divine Mend
data.description:
A quick heal that restores 461 health.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.
data.rawDescription:
A quick heal that restores {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Divine Petitioning
data.description: Reduces Supplication's cost by 15 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Reduces Supplication's cost by {COM_0_VAL1_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.
data.rawDescription: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} from melee abilities.

data.name: Divine Replenishment
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next 10 seconds, anytime they hit an enemy with a melee attack, they will regain 50 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, anytime they hit an enemy with a melee attack, they will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.

data.name: Divine Shock
data.description: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into all enemies in front of you, up to 30 feet away, and sends them flying backwards.
data.rawDescription: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into all enemies in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away, and sends them flying backwards.

data.name: Divine Warding
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 475 damage.
data.rawDescription: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} which will absorb up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, which will absorb up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Endless Guilt
data.description: The snare from Weight Of Guilt will now last for 10 seconds, and affects all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: The snare from Weight Of Guilt will now last for {ABIL_8255_COM_4_DURA_SECONDS}, and affects all enemies within {ABIL_8255_COM_4_RADI_FEET} of your target.

data.name: Exalted Defenses
data.description: Any time you defend against an attack, your casted healing abilities will become 20% more effective for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you defend against an attack, your casted healing abilities will become {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% more effective for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Fanaticism
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but reduces the effectiveness of your casted healing abilities by 20%.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to critically hit by {COM_2_VAL1}% and your chance to parry by {COM_1_VAL0}%, but reduces the effectiveness of your casted healing abilities by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fueled Fury
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Righteous Fury.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0} Righteous Fury.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 825, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 315 for the next 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by {COM_0_VAL0}, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by {COM_2_VAL0}, and all Resists by {COM_1_VAL0} for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Grace of Sigmar
data.description:
The healing from lifetaps are increased by 25%.

When wearing a shield Divine Strike will hit up to two additional enemies within 25ft of your target.
data.rawDescription:
The healing from lifetaps are increased by 25%.

When wearing a shield Divine Strike will hit up to two additional enemies within 25ft of your target.

data.name: Greave of Sigmar

data.rawDescription: Sigmar's Fist will now also increase your ally's Toughness as well, and will reduce your enemy's Strength and Toughness by {ABIL_8253_COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Guilty Soul
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a direct damage ability in the Path Of Wrath, your target will suffer an additional 405 Spirit Damage over 9 seconds and gain a blessing which increases your Path Of Wrath abilities by 5%. The blessing stacks up to 4 times.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit with a direct damage ability in the Path Of Wrath, your target will suffer an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Spirit Damage over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and gain a blessing which increases your Path Of Wrath abilities by 5%. The blessing stacks up to 4 times.

data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Target must be below 50% health
Builds 30 Righteous Fury
data.description: Deals 352 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Judgement
data.description: You call down the holy judgement of Sigmar, dealing 102 Spirit damage to the enemy and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 2 seconds.

data.description: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.
data.rawDescription: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.

data.name: Martyr's Blessing
data.description:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain 179 health, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury.
This effect will end if you lose your concentration or if you run out of Righteous Fury.
data.rawDescription:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, all allies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of you will regain {COM_2_VAL0_HEALTH}, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury.
This effect will end if you lose your concentration or if you run out of Righteous Fury.
